Title: Wusic - Web Music
Description:
Wusic.NET is an online video player and management system that highlights silverlight's rich-client functionality and potential.

Some of the custom controls that make up Wusic.NET are drag n' drop, modality, sizability, YouTube and FaceBook integration, and Mac'ish menubar.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Wusic.NET is an online music-video player and management system that highlights silverlight's rich-client functionality and potential.

Wusic.NET sources YouTube for music videos and adds a social-networking spin that allows users to collaboratively improve a song's selection and share playlists.

Some of the custom controls that make up Wusic.NET are drag n' drop, modality, sizability, YouTube and FaceBook integration, and Mac'ish menus.

See Wusic.NET for a live demo and download the source code to check it out w/ examples.
